use nyc_taxi_discovery;

select 
*
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as green_tripdata;

-- Data selection from a folder

select 
*
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as green_tripdata;


-- Data selection from a sub folders
select 
*
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as green_tripdata;

-- Get data from more than one file
select 
*
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv','trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=02/*.csv'),
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as green_tripdata;


-- Get data from more than one folder
select 
*
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as green_tripdata;


-- Get data along with file name using meta data function filename()
select 
TOP 100
gtd.filename() as filename ,
gtd.*
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv'),
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as gtd;


-- How many records for each file 
select 
TOP 100
gtd.filename() as filename ,
count(1) as record_count
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as gtd
group by gtd.filename()
order by gtd.filename();

-- limit the data using file name  function filename()
select 
TOP 100
gtd.filename() as filename ,
count(1) as record_count
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as gtd
where gtd.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
group by gtd.filename()
order by gtd.filename();

-- Using file path function filepath()
select 
TOP 100
gtd.filename() as filename ,
gtd.filepath() as filepath ,
count(1) as record_count
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as gtd
where gtd.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
group by gtd.filename(),gtd.filepath()
order by gtd.filename(),gtd.filepath();


-- Using file path function along with parameters
select 
TOP 100
gtd.filename() as filename ,
gtd.filepath(1) as YEAR , -- based on the numerica value it will return the position of the wildcard character
gtd.filepath(2) as MONTH ,
count(1) as record_count
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as gtd
where gtd.filename() in ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv','green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
group by gtd.filename(), gtd.filepath(1), gtd.filepath(2)
order by gtd.filename(), gtd.filepath(1), gtd.filepath(2);


-- Using file path function along with parameters
select 
TOP 100
gtd.filepath(1) as YEAR , -- based on the numerica value it will return the position of the wildcard character
gtd.filepath(2) as MONTH ,
count(1) as record_count
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as gtd
group by gtd.filename(), gtd.filepath(1), gtd.filepath(2)
order by gtd.filename(), gtd.filepath(1), gtd.filepath(2);

-- Using file path function along with parameters
select 
TOP 100
gtd.filepath(1) as YEAR , -- based on the numerica value it will return the position of the wildcard character
gtd.filepath(2) as MONTH ,
count(1) as record_count
From OPENROWSET(
    BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv'),
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as gtd
where gtd.filepath(1) = '2020'
and gtd.filepath(2) in ('06','07','08') -- Using file path in where clause
group by gtd.filename(), gtd.filepath(1), gtd.filepath(2)
order by gtd.filename(), gtd.filepath(1), gtd.filepath(2);
